罿字的基本解释

罿
chōng
即罦，一种捕鸟的网，鸟入网后，能自动将鸟罩住：“雉离于罿。”
捕鱼的网。

罿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōng］
［《廣韻》尺容切，平鍾，昌。］
［《廣韻》徒紅切，平東，定。］
(1)捕鸟网。
(2)喻法网。
(3)捕鱼网。

罿字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罿； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页949第35
【廣韻】尺容切【集韻】昌容切，?音衝。【說文】罬也。【玉篇】幡車罔。【爾雅·釋器】繴謂之罿。罿，罬也。【詩·王風】雉離于罿。【班固·西都賦】撫鴻罿。　又【廣韻】【正韻】徒紅切【集韻】徒東切，?音同。義同。　又【集韻】諸容切，音鍾。義同。

罿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
罿字的起名意思

暂无。

bird net
Basic explanation of words
bird net
chōng
That is, a net for catching birds. After the bird enters the net, it can automatically cover the bird: "The pheasant is away from the scorpion."
Fishing net.
bird net
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chōng］
["Guangyun" Ruler Rongqie, Pingzhong, Chang. ]
["Guangyun" Tu Hongqi, Pingdong, Ding. ]
(1) Bird nets.
(2) Yufanet.
(3) Fishing nets.
bird net
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Net Word Department] 　罿; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 949 35
[Guangyun] Chi Rongqie [Jiyun] Chang Rongqie,? Yinchong. 【Said Wen】罬也. [Jade articles] Flags and cars are not. 【Erya·Release Device】It's called the 罿.罿, 罬 also. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】The pheasant is separated from Yu Yu. 【Banggu·Xidu Fu】Fu Hongyu.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Tu Hong cut [Ji Yun] Tu Dong cut, the sound is the same. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Zhu Rongqie, sound clock. The same meaning.
